website_summaries.verdict: Premium spice and dry rub flavorings that will give you great results when grilling out.
pros: Offers four different seasonings and dry rubs in the set for a nice variety
High-quality ingredients with no GMOs, MSG, or other additives
Can use seasonings on meats or vegetables
cons: You may run out of these spices quickly
Set may ship in packs instead of jars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, easy, and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to have found these spices!! I used to make my own, as so many spices are heavy on sodium and sometimes contain surprising ingredients. I looked for a long time before deciding on these, and can honestly say they're great! I have tried all four, but my favorite is probably the veggie seasoning. Just cut up some veggies - I've cooked yellow squash, eggplant, sweet potatoes, and rutabaga - and sprinkle on as much or little as you like. I like a lot! Roast at 400 degrees for 40 minutes and you can't miss! Instant roasted veggies for eating or incorporating into your favorite recipes. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: yum
customer_reviews.text: Great for just about anything I want spices for. Takes the thinking out. Roasting, frying, adding the yum factor to beans, casseroles, any meat, even salads or salad dressing. Four stars only because there's not an organic version. If they were to make 1 pound bulk options, I'd be first to buy them. As is, these containers are over double the amount of the standard spice containers.
customer_reviews.author: kjd

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't excited when I ordered these but I needed something easy. I've used them and let me tell you that I will be ordering again. These are delicious!!! Very excited I tried something different and new!! The quality is above and beyond my initial already high expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Drae0879

customer_reviews.title: SPICE UP YOUR PALEO / WHOLE 30 !
customer_reviews.text: The Paleo/ Whole 30,eating regimen/diet really works, but it is highly dependent on spices. I was very happy to find these combinations from Tampico. They are great and make a fine difference in otherwise bland food. If you are entering the Paleo/Whole 30 realm, you will definitely want these!!
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Addictive
customer_reviews.text: Omg these spices are so awesome. I’m using them with everything. Fast delivery and i received them in jars, and a Tupperware for food on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Sakinah

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty blends
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor combos, I like them all. Unfortunately, for me there is a certain ingredient in the veggie seasoning that I have an inflammatory reaction to- I've tried it a few times now and my fingers swell each time. :( I have a really weird immune system though (diagonises of MG and Lupus 12+ years now). Nothing major that caused a major Lupus flare or took my MG out of remission or anything- just a part of my trial and error lifes journey! My favorite is the beef seasoning.
customer_reviews.author: Ilona Sisk

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set for anyone trying to eat clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for anyone trying to eat clean. There are no additives, unlike in most spice blends. Dealing with food allergies, in particular corn and corn derivatives, it is nice to find products without the usual dextrose, caramel-coloring, and citric acid. Additionally, the recipes you can make with this are endless. We use the spice blends in everything-- on grilled meats, in veggies and salads, and to make a mean chili. We've been able to cut down the prep time while still cooking healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex I.

customer_reviews.title: I use this ish on EVERYTHING!! Great sugar & salt free
customer_reviews.text: I love all the flavors and they came with a cute little bowl... I use these in almost every meal... I put this ish on everything!! Sugar free, salt free & keto friendly!!
customer_reviews.author: L. lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Rave Reviews
customer_reviews.text: Each of these spice blends is surprisingly unique and delicious. I've tried each on several different dishes, and have gotten rave reviews from my guests and family. I was a little worried that they'd be similar to the usual blends I've found from other brands, but I was very impressed with the creative flavors Tampico put together. I'm hoping to see more interesting spice combinations from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Dori Decamillis

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality but rather coarse texture
customer_reviews.text: I love the high quality ingredients and the actual flavors of the spice. However, it is ground fairly coarse and sometimes this it does not blend as well with the food I put it on. Veggies, for example. It is my personal preference that it is hard and coarse and doesn't mix well. Otherwise these are excellent products.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome spices!
customer_reviews.text: Great spices!! Worth the wait (I had to wait for restocking). I hope they continue making these. They make my food taste amazing 😊
customer_reviews.author: winterfrost

customer_reviews.title: Not to my liking
customer_reviews.text: Spices are very strong. I do not care for the spices selected to create the different bottles. Would return if allowed.
customer_reviews.author: debraterri

customer_reviews.title: Limited Edition Set “All Purpose”
customer_reviews.text: Delicious!!! I made some grilled chicken breast with the lemon garlic rub and my husband had no idea they were Paleo. He loved them and even asked for seconds. I am about to order the original seasonings and try those out too. I was very surprised I thought they were going to be bland, but they taste amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paloma

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: wow , this it’s superbly the best ever. Love it , will buy again. I recommend it highly!!!
customer_reviews.author: VHB

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pack while doing Whole30. My daughter loves the Veggie season so much! I finally found a way to get her to eat more veggies!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami H.

customer_reviews.title: I first discovered your spices at the LA Convention Center ...
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered your spices at the LA Convention Center 2 years ago at a Fitness-Health Expo. Your representative was passing out free samples and when I got home I tried them on my eggs, mixed it in ground turkey/steak and atop broiled chicken breast... delicious! I later found your website and have placed 2 separate orders. I now have 4 new flavor combos to enhance my meals. My reason for the 4stars over 5 was that I thought I was ordering the "4oz bags in the box" and not the 3oz jars.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wonder

customer_reviews.title: Adds Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased this product as an alternative to buying dozens of spices to season our paleo dishes with, and we were not disappointed. Provides excellent seasoning to all of our dishes. We will need to reorder soon. Got here real quick too!
customer_reviews.author: ECo1SG

customer_reviews.title: ... started eating a Paleo Diet and one of the worst things was trying to figure out how to season ...
customer_reviews.text: I just started eating a Paleo Diet and one of the worst things was trying to figure out how to season my foods and dress my salads etc. So, I typed "Paleo Spices" into Amazon and discovered these...I love it! Now, I can season everything I cook and know I am still eating Paleo!
customer_reviews.author: Tobin SLO

customer_reviews.title: The flavor of these are SO amazingly good!
customer_reviews.text: Love these seasonings! They add such awesome flavor to foods. So happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Taste great, plastic bottle though
customer_reviews.text: The flavors are great but I do wish they came in glass bottles vs plastic. I also would like it if they were a bit smaller grind so you dont always feel the crunch of some ingredients when eating. My favorite one is the ultimate spicy rub as it goes well with most dishes.
customer_reviews.author: vixen2188

customer_reviews.title: Price.
customer_reviews.text: They are great and have great flavor and smelled wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Gillis

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These spices are perfect for replacing salt! They add just the right amount of zest to meats and salads. I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Links

customer_reviews.title: Thanks.
customer_reviews.text: I only want to know if you can buy just the biggie seasoning alone.
customer_reviews.author: Jannie garlin

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I follow a Paleo Diet and bought these to enhance the flavor of my meal prep. I have to say I am very satisfied, especially with the poultry seasoning... its so good!!! I actually look forward to eating my meals every day. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anna C.

customer_reviews.title: ... I was interested to see what this would taste like on a variety of foods
customer_reviews.text: I am in a place where I cannot get fresh spices so I was interested to see what this would taste like on a variety of foods. It does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Wil V

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Spices!
customer_reviews.text: These seasonings are VERY flavorful and will add a kick to your meats, fish and veggies. The first time I used it was as part of a marinade for grilled skirt steak and my husband loved it. It was great because I was doing Whole30 and my husband was doing Paleo and were both able to enjoy them. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Simon

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is good, but none of them are my new favorite seasoning
customer_reviews.author: Sexyballerina02

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is some of the best seasoning I've ever tried. Great flavor without all the salt or sodium. I highly recommend this product and will continue to be an avid customer.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua conway

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavors
customer_reviews.text: REORDERED AGAIN and AGAIN... After 2 weeks into the Whole 30 program and going cold turkey on some of my favorite spices due to non-compliance, my wife found these on the "A" .These are great seasonings and premixed for convenience, my favorite is the Veggie that I use on everything!!! Great customer service as well...
customer_reviews.author: Rick J

customer_reviews.title: Great spice mixes
customer_reviews.text: Great spice mixes. I got these for my parents, who are nervous to use lots of different seasonings and rely on the mixes. They have loved these and it makes it easy to get good flavor, while knowing exactly what you are putting on your food with no additives and "extra" unnecessary ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Coloradogirl87

customer_reviews.title: ... for the last 6 months and these spices are fantastic!! I have tried them all and all ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been following a paleo lifestyle for the last 6 months and these spices are fantastic!! I have tried them all and all taste great! I really love the poultry one and the veggie one. I don't ever crave breaded chicken anymore, this spice tastes that good! I even eat leftovers cold!! These spices are great when you don't have the time to prepare a meal but want it to taste like you've slaved over the stove!!! 5 stars, hands down!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with these spices. I like highly seasoned foods & it is hard to find mixed spices without MSG or other problem ingredients. I am finding the entire Paleo line of foods & workouts extremely beneficial. Will definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laraine

customer_reviews.title: I especially liked sautéing broccoli
customer_reviews.text: As promised, these spices amped up the flavor of my cooking when I was frankly getting a little desperate for something new. I especially liked sautéing broccoli, cauliflower or zucchini in the morning with my eggs and these spice combos added some nice punch.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Forrest

customer_reviews.title: For anyone looking for healthy and tasty foods!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this product about a year ago and used it on everything from meats to salads to veggies. It's great even in my morning eggs. My wife and I are currently starting a strict paleo lifestyle and what better way to add flavor to our foods.. This product is a absolute must for all to try. Customer service is top notch and followed up with a personal email thanking me on our purchase. We are purchasing 2 more orders for our family Pollyanna.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Bozarth

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Have been a avid flavor god user but their spice blends are bland or taste the same. I was reluctant to venture and spend more money on custom blends but I gambled with the paleo spices. Def was rewarded with refreshing and colorful flavors. Nice find.
customer_reviews.author: Classic low tops

customer_reviews.title: Great Seasonings!
customer_reviews.text: We began our Whole 30 Journey without much direction. We came across this website and ordered and then ordered again and again! What wonderful tasting blends of spices with NO sugar...I am very pleased with these seasonings and will use them after the whole 30 program!
customer_reviews.author: Janice R. Harington

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful spices!
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific! We've used them on beef, chicken, pork, fish, and vegetables and love each variety! Hope "limited" does not mean they are around for a short period of time because I would definitely miss their addition to our food. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CarolinaP

customer_reviews.title: It’s was a good gift
customer_reviews.text: My son is very health conscious and eats clean It was a gift but I was told by him that it was very good and he was going to order more. He was happy I got it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Full flavor
customer_reviews.text: We were pleasantly surprised with how tasty the seasonings are. We have used all 4 and happy with the flavor it provides on all foods without being over powering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have spices!!
customer_reviews.text: The seasonings are GREAT. Just enough "punch" to make the food tasty - especially the vegetables!! It also adds great flavor to meat before barbecue!! Highly recommend as a "must have" for all Whole 30 users - or non users as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Very fresh, good smelling, quality seasonings. They seem more 'real' than the stuff you buy in the supermarket, that's been sitting on the shelf for god knows how long. I am looking forward to cooking with them.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Jo

customer_reviews.title: I have high hopes the seasonings will be wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this a 5 star rating because I received it as promised. Unfortunately I haven't had time to use it. I'll let you know. I have high hopes the seasonings will be wonderful

customer_reviews.title: great for meat
customer_reviews.text: I really like the meat seasonings, they add a lot to plain meat flavors. I haven't used the veg seasoning very much yet, but as all the others were so good I'm sure that will be too.

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product to have in your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product to have in your kitchen. I've used all 4 products and it sure gives flavor to your food. I'm currently on the Whole 30 and this already spice mixture for each food category has been a tremendous help especially when your trying to add some pop/flavor to your food. I would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Good mix.
customer_reviews.text: Good mix of spices. Used for beef, pork and fish and it taste great. Not a big fan of veggie one.

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal

customer_reviews.title: Primal seasonings to satisfy primal cravings!
customer_reviews.text: I love these spice rubs. Just began Paleo life and these rubs provide just the amount of delicious spiciness I crave. I am partial to the protein and ultimate spicy, cause I like things with a little heat! The jar is a nice size so will last through many tasty recipes!
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: ... was doing the Whole 30 and they are so good I will continue to use them long after the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these spices to keep my meals interesting while I was doing the Whole 30 and they are so good I will continue to use them long after the program is finished. The Poultry Seasoning is my favorite.

customer_reviews.text: I love the veggie and pork the best, but it doesn't come in the bottles only in the resealable pouches.

customer_reviews.title: Great Spices!
customer_reviews.text: These are great spices for someone following a diet or lifestyle such as Paleo. All four spices add great flavor to meals. Will be purchasing more in the future!

customer_reviews.title: Spices for whole 30.
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the whole 30 diet and it's hard to find a spice blend with compliant ingredients. All four are very good. Received a small Baggie with a sample seasoning. My fav is the pork seasoning and the veggie seasoning.

customer_reviews.title: So good! Love these!

Each of the spices have very good distinct flavors and has a much cleaner taste than other spice brands I have used. Overall, I am quite satisfied.

customer_reviews.text: Really like these spices - bought to get started on Whole30. No Salt - which I really liked. Made us realize how much salt we have been using. My favorite is the Beef/Pork but the Vegetable is good also. If you want more salt/pepper, you have to add it while cooking. I would recommend these spices to anyone wanting to cook healthier.

customer_reviews.text: I love these spices. I started the Whole 30 a few months ago and felt so good I have continued with it. All four seasonings are excellent. I use them often and they are lasting way longer than I thought they would. These are the only spices I use now.

customer_reviews.text: I gave these spices to my son-in-law as a gift. I was impressed by the natural ingredients and Paleo compatibility. My daughter's reaction was "Brilliant!". They are enjoying the spices immensely. Despite an earlier review, the spices did arrive in jars. Overall, a great gift!

customer_reviews.title: These are great! The veggie spice is my favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The veggie spice is my favorite so far. It's versatile and light, so I reach for it first when making new dishes. I used the beef/pork seasoning in beef and pork meatballs, and they turned out great! Highly recommend for anyone, paleo or not.

My two favs are the Honey Cajun Rub and the Lemon & Garlic Rub.

customer_reviews.text: I love these spices! The veggie one is so on point. I'll definitely be ordering them again. :)

customer_reviews.title: Great seasoning
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t miss anything from my regular spices! I thought I would have to loose something
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO KITCHEN SHOULD BE W/O..
customer_reviews.text: Our new favorite seasoning. All of them are awesome tasting with minimal to no salt added.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome if you are looking for spices that are flavorful ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome if you are looking for spices that are flavorful and great tasting without the sodium in most spices. I originally looked at Flavor god but the flavors can be overwhelming. These are simple and straight forward and taste delicious on anything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These spices are AMAZING!!! I don't feel like I am being deprived of deliciousness. Thank you for this.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia O

customer_reviews.title: I love all the spices I've ordered
customer_reviews.text: I love all the spices I've ordered, We use them daily. Now I'm looking for a spice rack for them. 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and Whole30 Compliant

product_meta.title: Paleo - Whole 30 - Spices by PALEO LIVING PRIMAL BLENDS Collection {4-Combo Pack & Meal Prep Container} can be used for Cooking, Grilling, Baking, & with Cookbooks (Limited Edition Set "All Purpose")
feature_bullets: 100% HANDCRAFTED ALL-PURPOSE PREMIUM SPICE BLENDS: {LIMITED EDITION gift box included} Jar Set includes; Ultimate Protein Rub-3.5 oz, Honey Cajun Rub-4 oz, Ultimate Spicy Rub-3.5 oz, & Lemon & Garlic Rub-3.5 oz

BONUS GIFT: Custom Meal Prep Container (Exclusively Engineered & Patented) INCLUDED in set. High Quality with custom logo engraved. Separate compartment for protein & veggies with built in utensils under lid. BPA Free, Dishwasher Safe, Microwavable, Freezer Safe.
NO JUNK ADDED OR HIDDEN: Products contain; NO MSG, NON GMO, Gluten Free, NO Artificial Preservatives, NO Table Salt, & NO Sugar. 100% ALL NATURAL Product. NO Processing Involved.

GIFT WRAPPING & FAST SHIPPING: Options are available. Standard two day shipping with prime or rush delivery options are also available during checkout. Perfect for any occasion Gift. Limited Sales for Memorial Day, Summer, 4th of July & Labor Day

PRODUCT GUARANTEE: We stand behind our CUSTOMER SATISFACTION GUARANTEE. If you are not satisfied with your purchase for whatever reason. We'll give you a FULL REFUND with NO QUESTIONS ASKED. 110% RISK FREE MONEY BACK GUARANTEE.
